p: The title compound was prepared by the mCPBA oxidation of 4-tert-Butyl-N-[4-chloro-2-(2-methyl-pyridine-3-carbonyl)-phenyl]-benzenesulfonamide according to the general procedure. 1H NMR (CDCl 3) δ 10.71 (br s, 1 H, NH), 8.62 (dm, 1H, J = 5.9 Hz), 7.81 (d, 1H. J = 9.1 Hz), 7.78 (dm, 2H, J = 8.4 Hz), 7.54 (dd, 1H, J = 8.8 Hz, J = 2.6 Hz), 7.48 (dm, 2H, J = 8.4 Hz), 7.44 (m, 2H), 7.18 (d, 1 H, J = 2.6 Hz), 2.32 (s, 3H), 1.32 (s, 9H). MS: m/z 459 (M +1).
